com.wessles.MERCury.opengl

Class VAOGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wessles.MERCury.opengl.VAOGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graphics

    public class VAOGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graphics
    An object used for graphics. It will draw just about anything for you.
    Author:
    wessles
